name: LightFire
description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Ace Astrogation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition
Ace Astrogation built the LightFire for pilots who like to push the edge, but not break the bank. Its focused design provides solid performance at the expense of the component’s durability and stealth.
description_cn:
物品类型：量子驱动器
制造商：王牌航天(Ace Astrogation)
尺寸：1
等级：C
类别：竞赛
王牌航天为那些喜欢挑战极限但又囊中羞涩的飞行员专门打造了"光火"。其核心设计是确保稳定的性能，但也因此牺牲了组件的耐用性和隐秘性。
